LanguageData: Comfier Than Usual Construct a human leather armchair The Architect Build 1000 Walls Building the Skynet Construct 30 mini-turrets It Ain't Rocket Science Build a spaceship I Will Survive Have 7 colonists I'm Still Standing Have 12 colonists I'm a Survivor Have 18 colonists Ain't no Stopping us Now Have 33 colonists Cheater, Cheater! Enable development mode T-800 Have a single pawn with bionic legs, arms, spine, ears and eyes I'm A Pirate! Install a peg leg on a pawn On Edge Gain immunity when infection is on 99% That'll Show Him Starve a pawn to death This Is Where The Fun Begins Get raided for the first time Show Must Go On Have a man in black join your colony Brrr Have a coldsnap happen in winter Phew Have a heatwave happen in summer Out Of The Frying Pan Have a colonist develop a bond with a pig Into The Fire Have a bonded pig die on fire Blitzkrieg Destroy 5 faction bases One Step Closer Obtain an AI Persona Core Human Leather Cowboy Hat Craft a human leather cowboy hat Midas Have 5000 gold <420blazeIt.label>4/20 Blaze It</420blazeIt.label> <420blazeIt.description>Obtain 420 smokeleaf</420blazeIt.description> Silence of the Lambs Obtain 100 human meat The Stuff Of Legends Craft any legendary item Future Caveman Make a plasteel club First Blood Kill another pawn Bloodlust Kill 100 humanlikes in total Blood For The Blood God Kill 1000 humanlikes in total Big Game Hunter Hunt and kill 20 Thrumbos Exterminator Kill 150 Insectoids Dragon Slayer Kill 50 Iguanas Australian Revenge Kill 30 Emus Three Little Pigs Have 3 Pigs and 1 Timberwolf Look At All Those Chickens Have 20 Geese Sustainable Fuel Source Have 8 Boomalopes Muffalo Rancher Have 12 Muffalos Ark Half Full Have 1 of every vanilla animal at the same time. Gentle Giant Tame a Thrumbo A Formal Complaint Have a pawn go berserk Call Of The Wild Have a pawn run wild Let's Start A Revolution Have 5 pawns on mental break at the same time <50ShadesOfGrey.label>50 Shades Of Grey</50ShadesOfGrey.label> <50ShadesOfGrey.description>Have a pawn go into a sadistic rage on a prisoner</50ShadesOfGrey.description> A Happy Ending Have a 90% average mood in the colony Are You Not Entertained? Have a 5% average mood in the colony Mercenary Complete any 5 quests Ambassador Of Peace Complete 3 PeaceTalks quests One Shot One Kill Have a single pawn score 100 headshots. Trigger-Happy Have a single pawn fire 2000 shots One Solid Gardner Have a single pawn sow 10000 plants. Life Sentence Have a single prisoner for 2 years. I Might Need A Shrink Have a single pawn spend 24 hours total in Mental Breaks. Dr. Dolittle Have a single pawn tame 50 animals. Professional Stripper Have a single pawn strip 100 bodies. Blade Runner Have a single pawn kill 50 mechanoids <3StarMichelin.label>3 Star Michelin</3StarMichelin.label> <3StarMichelin.description>Have a single pawn cook 10000 meals.</3StarMichelin.description> Scrub Up Perform a total of 50 operations. The Rim's Brightest Spend a total of 2 years researching. I Wish This Was IKEA Construct AND Disassemble a total of 100 structures. I'm On Fire! Have a single pawn spend a total of 3 days on fire. Sticks And Stones Research all neolithic technologies Out of the Dark Ages Research all medieval technologies Industrial Revolution Research all industrial technologies Off To The Stars Research all spacer technologies Sharpshooter Have a colonist reach level 20 in shooting Mr. President Have a colonist reach level 20 in Social Conan The Barbarian Have a colonist reach level 20 in Melee Could Be Worse Survive a Quadrum It's All Downhill From Here Survive a year 10 Hours? Woah! Spend 10 hours playing the current colony Wait a Minute! Spend 100 hours playing the current colony Pablo Emilio Escobar Gaviria Sell 400 Yayo to a single trader in a single transation Wolf Of Wall Street Earn 3000 silver from a single transaction Slaver Scum Sell 5 prisoners in a single transaction In For A Penny Amass colony wealth of 100000 In For A Pound Amass colony wealth of 1000000
